name: Words within words that start with CON Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
The question layout is as described below:

PRE + A clue for the 'word within the word' = A clue for the combined word. 

The answer is the combined word.

CON + To have dispatched a letter = Permission.
CON + A word to describe someone of low intelligence = To change from a gas to a liquid.
CON + The location of spelunking = Curved inwards.
CON + To go down (stairs) = To talk to someone patronizingly.
CON + The place where tears come from = To allow heat to pass through.
CON + A mission to achieve a specific goal = The process of taking over a new territory.
CON + The line leading to explosives = To mistake one person for another.
CON + The side of an object which faces forward = To challenge what someone is doing.
CON + Resistant to pressure being applied = To verify the truth in a statement.
CON + To charge money for damages = To keep in an enclosed space.
